701946f-a.text:
2015 University Ave., at the S.W. corner of West 180th Street, showing a 5-story apartment house nearing completion.
Fall 1921.

701945f-a.text:
University Avenue, west side, north from W. 180th Street to Hall of Fame Terrace. The building in the right background
is Gould Hall of New York University.
January 30, 1938.
P.L. Sperr
